Container.Name: MusicBrainz
Container.Overview: Locally hosted mirror of musicbrainz for use in conjunction with headphones etc...
Container.Description: Locally hosted mirror of musicbrainz for use in conjunction with headphones etc...[br][br][b]Requires the downloading of initial databases from musicbrainz[br][br]Downloaded from ftp://ftp.musicbrainz.org/pub/musicbrainz/data/fullexport/ or the European mirror server at ftp://eu.ftp.musicbrainz.org/MusicBrainz/data/fullexport/
